projects.name: YOLO CNN Approach for Object Detection
projects.description: Developed a mask detection system using deep learning and computer vision techniques with RESNET architecture. The model identifies faces and distinguishes between masked, incorrectly masked, and unmasked individuals. It is refined through transfer learning on a customized, annotated dataset.

projects.name: Quiz Up Web Application
projects.description: Designed an engaging web platform with diverse quiz categories and competitive gameplay. Features personalized profiles, achievement badges, leaderboards, and social media integration. Ensures a seamless, interactive user experience, combining entertainment with educational value.

projects.name: Classroom Allocation to Sections (CSP)
projects.description: Engineered a Python-based genetic algorithm using AI to optimize classroom allocation, enhancing uniform utilization, conflict prevention, and resource management in educational settings.

experiences.description: Demonstrated proficiency in Salesforce fundamentals, process automation, and advanced development practices. Skilled in Apex, testing, debugging, and modernized workflows with VS Code and CLI.

Designed and developed responsive web applications using modern web technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Worked with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and understand project scope. Collaborated with UI/UX designers to create visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces Implemented client-side and server-side functionalities using frameworks like AngularJS and Node.js.
